title: Medical Education MOOC for COVID-19 Response: Short-Intensive Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and public health concepts
context.additional_context: Emphasis on COVID-19 clinical response competencies considering medical environments in low- and middle-income countries, with offline discussion-based case analysis after completing online modules

learning_goals: Learners can explain COVID-19 virus characteristics, transmission routes, and preventive measures with over 90% accuracy
Clinical scenarios can be divided into three or more stages, from screening suspected infection cases to isolation protocols, and applied accordingly.
Based on WHO/local health authority guidelines, learners can list four or more procedures for using personal protective equipment (PPE) and infection control principles.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
